name: Visitors to Gilligan's Island Online Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Phil Silvers arrives on the island and gets involved in a musical version of what play?
questions.explanation:
"Hamlet".

	The play's the thing - to cheer up Ginger.

questions.text: Don Rickles shows up as a kidnapper and a thief. Which of the following does NOT have something stolen from him (or her) at the party?
questions.explanation:
Mary Ann.

	He takes a necklace from Mrs. Howell, a wallet from Mr. Howell, and earrings from Ginger.

questions.text: The deposed dictator who ends up on the island is played by ...?
questions.explanation:
Nehemiah Persoff.

	Martin plays the radio show contestant, who is trying to win a prize by going it alone.

questions.text: Harold J. Stone plays an artist who is "outdone" by which of the castaways?
questions.explanation:
Gilligan.

	Gilligan is the "rival" painter that everyone "prefers".

questions.text: When "mad scientist" Vito Scotti rescues the castaways, Gilligan is "exchanged" with what person?
questions.explanation:
Mr. Howell

	Ginger switches with Mike Mazurki; Mary Ann switches with Professor.

questions.text: The butterfly collector who arrives on the island is played by ...?
questions.explanation:
John McGiver.

	He always plays these offbeat characters.

questions.text: Which actor plays two different characters (in two different episodes)?
questions.explanation:
Denny Miller.

	Miller plays a surfer and a would-be actor (playing Tarzan). Conried appears twice - as the same character, Wrong Way Feldman. Calhoun is the hunter. Russell is the "jungle boy".

questions.text: Zsa Zsa Gabor gets romantically interested in which of the castaways?
questions.explanation:
Professor.

	He's all science, however. Too bad for Zsa Zsa.

questions.text: A lion appears on the island; Gilligan believes that the lion has eaten ...?
questions.explanation:
Skipper.

	The lion is atop the crate and Skipper is in the crate.

questions.text: When natives from another island arrive, Giligan is forced to participate in a duel with a "rival suitor" for a native woman. The duel includes which of the following?
questions.explanation:
Throwing spears.

	Bad aim by Gilligan hits coconuts in the tree - which fall on his adversary.
